headers.list-id: Ubuntu bug tracker changes - HIGH VOLUME <ubuntu-bugs.lists.ubuntu.com>

body.para: Apparently they do use this unless xinerama is enabled on the system due to potential bugs and it appears xinerama is now enabled by default on all Ubuntu systems if not all Xorg systems period. I let them know it appears xinerama is enabled by default on all systems and waiting to hear back from them.
body.footer: -- OOo Slideshow and Fullscreen modes - not full screen under compiz https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/525807 You received this bug notification because you are a member of Ubuntu Bugs, which is subscribed to Ubuntu.
